name: Nation Arena
description:
In a futuristic world, the war between the nations has stopped, but not the conflict And the only way to fix the issue is to send their champions to fight with the fourth elements in an arena

Play as one of theses champions in free-for-all and use the fire, water, wind, earth or combine two of them to beat your friend by sending them out of the arena and win the match !
